item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:

Cosi

Drink specials are:
$3 Domestic Beers, $4 Imports, $4 Well Drinks & House Wine, $5 Top Shelf.

Managers Carlos and Chris will provide us with FREE:
Flatbread & Round Pizza & a selection of other goodies.


Please note: Due to the generous drink specials, we have agreed to a cash bar. There is an ATM on the 1st floor.

Your contact is: Robyn-Allise - 203-823-5302
Please RSVP right now!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***

Post-party location TBD.
item.name: Happy Hour - COSI **CASH BAR ONLY**
